data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word وَلَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
data.sentence: The word حِسَابِيَهْ comes from the root ح س ب and is associated with the meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
The word أَدْرِ comes from the root د ر ي and is associated with the meanings: To know, know by skill.
